title: Romance Guide
content: well as freeing slaves as she was once enslaved when she was younger. Gaining Karlach's approval centers around being forthcoming and somewhat heroic - showing compassion toward the wronged and almost uncompromising good. This might put decisions that will gain her approval at odds with other Companions like Shadowheart and Lae'Zel. Additionally, her context as someone who just escaped the Hells makes attunes her towards people who do actions that express their love of life and being outgoing. A
